Name: Lunch Tycoon
About the game: It's lunchtime, and the orders are piling in! Manage your restaurant by completing customer orders, stocking up on inventory, marketing your business, and cleaning up the dinning room. Lunch Tycoon is a management strategy game where you run all parts of your restaurant. Keep customers happy and you'll earn stars, but miss too many orders and - you'll business will slow to a crawl. Features: -Minimalistic Design -Inventory Management: Keep inventory stocked, buy food when prices are low -Serve Customers: Fill customer orders quickly -Clean Dining Area: Clear tables to allow more customers + possible tips -Your very own office: Run advertisements, and watch your money grow -Star Rating: Happy customers will increase your star rating. More stars means more $
